name: Jose Luis Camean VR Experience
description:
Open the zip file and find the FortLytton_VR.exe file. You will need a VR device HTC VIVE.

2050 FORT-LYTTON, It is a recreation of the location of the authentic Fort Lytton base at Brisbane for virtual reality experience.

The theme is Scifi-futuristic in 2050 where the base was almost abandon because any conflict happen in the world. You will be the only guardian that maintain the base. Until the day the base is under attack, all the alarm goes on. You will wake up on your room, listening explosion outside. Check the computer with the exclamation mark and can give you a clue what to do. 

After you seen the map, you go straight to the main room, look for the button to deactivate the noise alarm and activate the weapons generators.

As soon as you do that, run to get the weapons and shot the Scifi-fighter. You have a cannon, a robot and a turrets to chose. Good luck.

VR Interactions:

  • Interact able objects in the room ( chair, bin, glass, computer,etc).
  • Head gaze looking to the exclamation mark + trigger to see the map.
  • Sliding doors by approximation.
  • Button to switch off the alarm, change material in generators, and switch character posses (Robot, Cannon, Turret).
  • Trigger fire guns.
  • Robot movecontrol by Thumbstick.
  • Enemy shoot fire and follow path.
  • By time enemy explode.
  • Music change in the room to the exterior.

PROTOTYPE STILL IN PROCESS.
